.@AppropsDems look forward to continuing our fight to ensure government funding tackles some of the biggest challenges we face at home and abroad and supports working people, not big corporations or the wealthy.
These next few weeks of Appropriations Committee markups will be critical in shaping how the federal government funds the resources that impact your life.
If you use your local library or take public transportation, then we just found a few examples of how federal government funding impacts you!
From lowering costs for working families to supporting our Veterans to making college more affordable‚Äîfederal funds impact every aspect of our lives.
So, what are the ways a federal government funding bill could impact you and your life?

During these markups, Members work to ensure federal dollars are being spent to meet the needs of the people they represent.

Every district in America has different needs, so it is important these Members are a part of the process of deciding how to fund federal programs.

This month, Members of the US House of Representatives who sit on the Appropriations Committee, will examine 12 bills written to fund the federal government & community projects in 2023 & make changes to these bills.
A markup is when elected government officials make edits to a bill. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/FVIxMHjVIAgaTCN.jpg
